channel.title: CVE Feed for secupress -- SecuPress Free — WordPress Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for secupress -- SecuPress Free — WordPress Security

item.title: CVE-2024-1504|2024-08-01T18:40:21.099Z -- secupress -- secupress%20free%20%E2%80%94%20wordpress%20security
item.description: The SecuPress Free — WordPress Security plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.5.1. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the secupress_blackhole_ban_ip() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to block a user's IP via a forged request granted they can trick the user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-1504|2024-06-04T18:00:03.011Z -- secupress -- secupress%20free%20%E2%80%94%20wordpress%20security
item.description: The SecuPress Free — WordPress Security plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.5.1. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the secupress_blackhole_ban_ip() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to block a user's IP via a forged request granted they can trick the user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
